title: Raw T206 - 41 Different (SOLD as a Lot to Net54 Member for $1500++)
author: Herpolsheimer

posts.post_title: Raw T206 - 41 Different (SOLD as a Lot to Net54 Member for $1500++)
posts.post_content:
Aloha,

I hope all are staying safe and being smart.  I am cleaning up some collections and have 41 raw T206 for sale.  Backs are in the same position as fronts.  Please provide offers if you are interested.  Due to the rapid uptick in valuations offers under $30 will be ignored until I have a chance to review the card.  Later I will provide pricing on the cards that do not sell prior to posting to eBay. There are just too many cards that I need to go through.  I will provide shipping and all cards are in a penny sleeve inside a holder and will be shipped that way.  Thank you...

Aloha,

I had no idea there would be so much interest.  I have SOLD the cards as a Lot to another Net54 Member.  Thank you all for your interest.  

Stay Safe and Be Smart... Best Regards to All....Good Hunting....

PM sent


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
